name: NOVELL SMOOTHING CREAM (NSC)
kandungan: Dimethicone (silicone gel),onion extract (Allium cepa bulb), algae extr, oxypeptide, shea butter, arnica extr, ascorbyl palmitate, beta-carotene, calendula, squalene, comfrey extr, palmitoyl, vit E, pycnogenol, copper gluconate, chitosan, retinyl palmitate
indikasi: Mengatasi bekas luka yang menonjol (hypertrophic scar) & keloid akibat prosedur operasi, bekas luka trauma & luka terbakar, membantu menyamarkan stretchmarks.
perhatian: Hindari terkena mata. Penggunaan pada luka di mulut, mata & membran mukosa
